TermDefinition.DefinitionText: X-rays of the colon and rectum that are taken after a person is given a barium enema.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "lower GI series"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "tránsito gastrointestinal inferior"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Radiografías del colon y el recto que se toman después de que la persona recibe un enema de bario.
